field.name: AccountCheckPrintingLayout
field.label: Check Layout
field.help: Select the format corresponding to the check paper you will be printing your checks on. In order to disable the printing feature, select 'None'.

field.name: AccountCheckPrintingDateLabel
field.label: Print Date Label
field.help: This option allows you to print the date label on the check as per CPA. Disable this if your pre-printed check includes the date label.

field.name: AccountCheckPrintingMultiStub
field.label: Multi-Pages Check Stub
field.help: This option allows you to print check details (stub) on multiple pages if they don't fit on a single page.

field.name: AccountCheckPrintingMarginTop
field.label: Check Top Margin
field.help: Adjust the margins of generated checks to make it fit your printer's settings.

field.name: AccountCheckPrintingMarginLeft
field.label: Check Left Margin
field.help: Adjust the margins of generated checks to make it fit your printer's settings.

field.name: AccountCheckPrintingMarginRight
field.label: Right Margin
field.help: Adjust the margins of generated checks to make it fit your printer's settings.
